item.title: Report X-2025030431
item.description:
Report X-2025030431

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO ASSUMED LEAKER WEARING ALL PPE FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND PROCEEDED TO CONTAIN AND CLEAN UP SPILL. AFTER READING THE INVOICE SHE DISCOVERED THAT THE INVOICE HAD CLASS 8 UN1805. UPON INSPECTION REWRAP; NO LEAK. PHOSPHORIC ACID SOLUTION
